titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: CARE PROFESSIONAL TIER FOR EMERGENCY CARE - National Codes

stentry.p: Require complete supervision. All PATIENTS must be signed off by a senior CARE PROFESSIONAL before admission or discharge

strow.stentry: Require access to advice or direct supervision, or practice independently but with limited scope

stentry.p: More senior/experienced CARE PROFESSIONALS, requiring less direct supervision. Fewer limitations in scope of practice
Senior CARE PROFESSIONALS able to supervise an Emergency Care Department alone with remote support. Possess some extended skills. Full scope of practice
Senior CARE PROFESSIONALS (CONSULTANTS) with accredited advanced qualifications in Emergency Medicine. Full set of extended skills. Full scope of practice
